name: Cgi-checkers
body:
## Welcome to GCI Checkers Page
GCI Checkers is a checkers game created in html, using canvas and javascript.

## How to play
You must move a piece every turn, if you can't move anything, you must surrender using the "Surrender" button.
To move a piece, you need to select it and the press the "Move" button. If you pressed the "Move" button, there will appear the options marked with a blue squares where you can move.
In this stage, if you select anything else other then the blue squares, you will deselect the current piece.
If you selected a blue square, you must move that piece until you can't move it any more.
After that you can give the turn to the other player using the button "Give Turn".

## Try it!
Using this [link]() you can try the game.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the game? Post an issue at [CGI Checkers](https://github.com/adriangaro/CGI-Checkers).
